evidence.text: No monitor was appointed in this case as evidenced by the complete absence of 'monitor' or 'compliance monitoring' references across all fully reviewed documents (Docket, Temporary TRO, Second Revised TRO) and 23% of Complaint. The case concerns funding injunctions, not monitoring compliance with court orders.

The Docket (7,409 tokens fully read), Temporary Restraining Order (1,909 tokens), Second Revised Temporary Restraining Order (1,996 tokens), and Complaint (10,000 tokens read) contain no mention of any court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor. The case involves injunctions against HUD/HHS regarding grant funding conditions, not compliance monitoring.
